name: Bleed 2
description: Bleed 2 is a relentless arcade action game featuring air-dodging, bullet-reflecting, and tons of bosses. Now with randomly-generated levels and daily challenges, too!
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: Windows 7/Vista/XP 處理器: 2.0 Ghz dual core 記憶體: 2 GB 記憶體 顯示卡: 512MB video card (XNA 4.0 compatible, Shader Model 2.0 or higher) DirectX: 版本：9.0c 儲存空間: 500 MB 可用空間 音效卡: DirectX-compatible sound card 備註: Xbox 360 controller supported
